io.spine.server.aggregate

Class AggregateTransaction<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Transaction<I,Aggregate<I,S,B>,S,B>
      • io.spine.server.aggregate.AggregateTransaction<I,S,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of aggregate IDs
    S - the type of aggregate state
    B - the type of a ValidatingBuilder for the aggregate state

    @Internal
public class AggregateTransaction<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
extends Transaction<I,Aggregate<I,S,B>,S,B>
    A transaction, within which Aggregate instances are modified.

    • Method Detail

      • dispatch

        protected final void dispatch(Aggregate aggregate,
                              io.spine.core.EventEnvelope event)
        Dispatches the event message and its context to the current entity-in-transaction.

        This operation is always performed in scope of an active transaction.

        As long as event applier method does not operate with event context, this parameter is ignored.

        Specified by:
        dispatch in class Transaction<I,Aggregate<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
        Parameters:
        aggregate - the target entity
        event - the event to dispatch

      • commit

        protected void commit()
        Applies all the outstanding modifications to the enclosed entity.

        This method is overridden to expose itself to repositories, state builders, and test utilities.

        Overrides:
        commit in class Transaction<I,Aggregate<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
